usage.description: A 60-card horror expansion with genre-focused cards for creating dark and unsettling worlds. Contains cues that may be disturbing - use care, communication, and check-ins.
integration: Use only expansion cards - Create a world of up to 8 microsettings with cohesive horror focus
Mix expansion cards into the main deck - Add horror embellishments without restricting to single genre
Mix cards and use a sideboard - Less random, more intentional worldbuilding when mixing multiple expansions
usage.content_warning: This expansion contains cues about violence and death. We recommend using care, communication, and check-ins when using the deck, especially for collaboration or publication. Horror elements can be powerful and painful triggers for many people. There is incredible diversity in what different cultures find horrific. Fear is often rooted in misunderstanding. What might be taboo or terrifying in one culture is normal in another. Think about how you frame the horror elements of your world and which cultural perspective that horror is viewed from.
